item.title: Diana add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Diana add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Diana add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "Why didn't I learn to treat everything like it was the last time. My greatest regret was how much I believed in the future." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Diana add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Diana add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Remember, Hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things, and no good thing ever dies." -- Stephen King

item.title: Diana add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Diana add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Diana add a quote by Candace Bushnell
item.description: "The universe may not always play fair, but at least it's got a hell of a sense of humor." -- Candace Bushnell

item.title: Diana add a quote by Tina Fey
item.description: "If you retain nothing else, always remember the most important rule of beauty, which is: who cares?" -- Tina Fey
